attributes.label: color
attributes.description: Select the badge color.

tags.label: wcs-button
tags.description: Button component, can also be a link when specifying href.

attributes.label: color
attributes.description: Specify the button color.

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: Specify wether the button is disabled or not.

attributes.label: href
attributes.description:
Set a URL to point to.
If specified use a `a` tag instead of `btn`.

attributes.label: mode
attributes.description:
This attribute specifies the size of the button.
Setting this attribute will change the height and padding of a button.

attributes.label: ripple
attributes.description: Specify wether the button should have a ripple effect or not.

attributes.label: type
attributes.description: Specify the button type.

attributes.label: checked
attributes.description: If `true`, the checkbox is selected.

tags.label: wcs-progress-bar
tags.description: Component displaying progress as a bar.

attributes.label: show-label
attributes.description: Whether it displays a label indicating the percentage of progress above the bar.

attributes.label: small
attributes.description: Whether the component display the small version

attributes.label: value
attributes.description:
The actual value of the progress.
Ranging from 0 to 100.

tags.label: wcs-select-option
tags.description: Select option component, use in conjuction with wcs-select.

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: Wether this option can be selected.

attributes.label: selected
attributes.description: Wether this option is selected.

attributes.label: value
attributes.description: The option value, not what's displayed, use inner text instead.

tags.label: wcs-select
tags.description: Select component, use in conjuction with wcs-select-option.

attributes.label: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the select.

attributes.label: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.label: placeholder
attributes.description: The text to display when the select is empty.

attributes.label: value
attributes.description: The currently selected value.

attributes.label: header
attributes.description: The header you want to be displayed for this tab.

tags.label: wcs-tabs
tags.description:
### Features:
- [ ] Switch between different tabs
- [ ] Default selected value
- [ ] Disabled tab
- [ ] Customizing tab header
- [x] Header alignment, left / center / right
- [ ] Animation
- [ ] Disable animation
- [ ] Accessibility
  - LEFT_ARROW    Move focus to previous tab
  - RIGHT_ARROW    Move focus to next tab
  - HOME    Move focus to first tab
  - END    Move focus to last tab
  - SPACE or ENTER    Switch to focused tab
- [ ] Customize animation

attributes.label: selected-index
attributes.description: Current selected tab index
